verses.verse: And <WG2532> Jesus entered<WG1525> and passed through<WG1330> Jericho.<WG2410>

And, <WG2532> behold,<WG2400> there was a man<WG435> named<WG3686> <WG2564> Zacchaeus,<WG2195> <WG2532> which<WG846> was<WG2258> the chief among the publicans,<WG754> and<WG2532> he<WG3778> was<WG2258> rich.<WG4145>

And <WG2532> he sought<WG2212> to see<WG1492> Jesus<WG2424> who<WG5101> he was;<WG2076> and<WG2076> could<WG1410> not<WG3756> for<WG575> the<WG3588> press,<WG3793> because<WG3754> he was<WG2258> little<WG3398> of stature.<WG2244>
And <WG2532> he ran<WG4390> before,<WG1715> and climbed up<WG305> into<WG1909> a sycamore tree<WG4809> to<WG2443> see<WG1492> him:<WG846> for<WG3754> he was<WG3195> to pass<WG1330> that<WG1565> way.

And <WG2532> when<WG5613> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> to<WG1909> the<WG3588> place,<WG5117> he looked up,<WG308> and saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> Zacchaeus, <WG2195> make haste,<WG4692> and come down;<WG2597> for<WG1063> today<WG4594> I<WG3165> must<WG1163> abide<WG3306> at<WG1722> thy<WG4675> house. <WG3624>
And <WG2532> he made haste,<WG4692> and came down,<WG2597> and<WG2532> received<WG5264> him<WG846> joyfully.<WG5463>
And <WG2532> when they saw<WG1492> it, they all<WG537> murmured,<WG1234> saying,<WG3004> That<WG3754> he was gone<WG1525> to be guest<WG2647> with<WG3844> a man<WG435> that is a sinner.<WG268>

And <WG1161> Zacchaeus<WG2195> stood,<WG2476> and said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> the<WG3588> Lord;<WG2962> Behold,<WG2400> Lord,<WG2962> the<WG3588> half<WG2255> of my<WG3450> goods<WG5224> I give<WG1325> to the<WG3588> poor;<WG4434> and<WG2532> if<WG1487> I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation,<WG4811> <WG5100> <WG5100> I restore<WG591> him fourfold.<WG5073>

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> This day<WG4594> is salvation<WG4991> come<WG1096> to this<WG5129> house<WG3624> forsomuch as<WG2530> he<WG846> also<WG2532> is<WG2076> a son<WG5207> of Abraham. <WG11>
For <WG1063> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> is come<WG2064> to seek<WG2212> and<WG2532> to save<WG4982> that which was lost. <WG622>

And <WG1161> as they<WG846> heard<WG191> these things,<WG5023> he added<WG4369> and spake<WG2036> a parable,<WG3850> because he<WG846> was<WG1511> nigh to<WG1451> Jerusalem,<WG2419> and<WG2532> because they<WG846> thought<WG1380> that<WG3754> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> should<WG3195> immediately<WG3916> appear.<WG398>

He said<WG2036> therefore,<WG3767> A certain<WG5100> noble<WG2104> man<WG444> went<WG4198> into<WG1519> a far<WG3117> country<WG5561> to receive<WG2983> for himself<WG1438> a kingdom,<WG932> and<WG2532> to return. <WG5290>

And <WG1161> he called<WG2564> his<WG1438> ten<WG1176> servants,<WG1401> and delivered<WG1325> them<WG846> ten<WG1176> pounds,<WG3414> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Occupy<WG4231> till<WG2193> I come. <WG2064>

But <WG1161> his<WG846> citizens<WG4177> hated<WG3404> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> sent<WG649> a message<WG4242> after<WG3694> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> We will not<WG3756> have<WG2309> this<WG5126> man to reign<WG936> over<WG1909> us. <WG2248>

And <WG2532> it came to pass,<WG1096> that when he<WG846> was returned,<WG1880> having received<WG2983> the<WG3588> kingdom,<WG932> then<WG2532> he commanded<WG2036> these<WG5128> servants<WG1401> to be called<WG5455> unto him,<WG848> to whom<WG3739> he had given<WG1325> the<WG3588> money,<WG694> that<WG2443> he might know<WG1097> how much<WG5101> every man<WG5100> had gained by trading. <WG1281>
Then <WG1161> came<WG3854> the<WG3588> first,<WG4413> saying,<WG3004> Lord,<WG2962> thy<WG4675> pound<WG3414> hath gained<WG4333> ten<WG1176> pounds. <WG3414>

And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Well,<WG2095> thou good<WG18> servant: <WG1401> because<WG3754> thou hast been<WG1096> faithful<WG4103> in<WG1722> a very little,<WG1646> have <WG2468> <WG2192> thou authority<WG1849> over<WG1883> ten<WG1176> cities. <WG4172>
And <WG2532> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> came,<WG2064> saying,<WG3004> Lord,<WG2962> thy<WG4675> pound<WG3414> hath gained<WG4160> five<WG4002> pounds. <WG3414>
And <WG1161> he said<WG2036> likewise<WG2532> to him,<WG5129> Be<WG1096> thou<WG4771> also<WG2532> over<WG1883> five<WG4002> cities. <WG4172>

And <WG2532> another<WG2087> came,<WG2064> saying,<WG3004> Lord,<WG2962> behold,<WG2400> here is thy<WG4675> pound,<WG3414> which<WG3739> I have<WG2192> kept laid up<WG606> in<WG1722> a napkin: <WG4676>

For <WG1063> I feared<WG5399> thee,<WG4571> because<WG3754> thou art<WG1488> an austere<WG840> man: <WG444> thou takest up<WG142> that<WG3739> thou laidst not down, <WG5087> <WG3756> and <WG2532> reapest<WG2325> that<WG3739> thou didst not<WG3756> sow. <WG4687>

And <WG1161> he saith<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Out<WG1537> of thine own<WG4675> mouth<WG4750> will I judge<WG2919> thee,<WG4571> thou wicked<WG4190> servant.<WG1401> Thou knewest<WG1492> that<WG3754> I<WG1473> was<WG1510> an austere<WG840> man,<WG444> taking up<WG142> that<WG3739> I laid not down, <WG5087> <WG3756> and <WG2532> reaping<WG2325> that<WG3739> I did not<WG3756> sow: <WG4687>

Wherefore <WG1302> then<WG2532> gavest<WG1325> not<WG3756> thou my<WG3450> money<WG694> into<WG1909> the<WG3588> bank,<WG5132> that<WG2532> at my<WG1473> coming<WG2064> I might have required <WG4238> <WG302> mine own<WG846> with<WG4862> usury? <WG5110>

And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto them that stood by,<WG3936> Take<WG142> from<WG575> him<WG846> the<WG3588> pound,<WG3414> and<WG2532> give<WG1325> it to him that hath<WG2192> ten<WG1176> pounds. <WG3414>
(And <WG2532> they said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Lord,<WG2962> he hath<WG2192> ten<WG1176> pounds.) <WG3414>

For <WG1063> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> That<WG3754> unto every one<WG3956> which hath<WG2192> shall be given;<WG1325> and<WG1161> from<WG575> him that hath<WG2192> not,<WG3361> even<WG2532> that<WG3739> he hath<WG2192> shall be taken away<WG142> from<WG575> him. <WG846>

But <WG4133> those<WG1565> mine<WG3450> enemies,<WG2190> which would<WG2309> not<WG3361> that I<WG3165> should reign<WG936> over<WG1909> them,<WG846> bring<WG71> hither,<WG5602> and<WG2532> slay<WG2695> them before<WG1715> me. <WG3450>
And <WG2532> when he had thus<WG5023> spoken,<WG2036> he went<WG4198> before,<WG1715> ascending up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem.<WG2414>

And <WG2532> it came to pass,<WG1096> when<WG5613> he was come nigh<WG1448> to<WG1519> Bethphage<WG967> and<WG2532> Bethany,<WG963> at<WG4314> the<WG3588> mount<WG3735> called<WG2564> the mount of Olives,<WG1636> he sent<WG649> two<WG1417> of his<WG848> disciples,<WG3101>

Saying, <WG2036> Go <WG5217> ye into<WG1519> the<WG3588> village<WG2968> over against<WG2713> you; in<WG1722> the which<WG3739> at your entering<WG1531> ye shall find<WG2147> a colt<WG4454> tied,<WG1210> whereon <WG1909> <WG3739> yet never <WG4455> <WG3762> man <WG444> sat: <WG2523> loose<WG3089> him,<WG846> and bring<WG71> him hither.

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> ask<WG2065> you,<WG5209> Why<WG1302> do ye loose<WG3089> him? thus<WG3779> shall ye say<WG2046> unto him,<WG846> Because<WG3754> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> hath<WG2192> need<WG5532> of him. <WG846>
And <WG1161> they that were sent<WG649> went their way,<WG565> and found<WG2147> even as<WG2531> he had said<WG2036> unto them.<WG846>

And <WG1161> as they<WG846> were loosing<WG3089> the<WG3588> colt,<WG4454> the<WG3588> owners<WG2962> thereof<WG846> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Why<WG5101> loose<WG3089> ye the<WG3588> colt?<WG4454>
And <WG1161> they<WG3588> said,<WG2036> The<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> hath<WG2192> need<WG5532> of him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> they brought<WG71> him<WG846> to<WG4314> Jesus:<WG2424> and<WG2532> they cast<WG1977> their<WG1438> garments<WG2440> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> colt,<WG4454> and they set Jesus thereon.<WG1913> <WG2424>
And <WG1161> as he<WG846> went,<WG4198> they spread<WG5291> their<WG848> clothes<WG2440> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> way.<WG3598>

And <WG1161> when he<WG846> was come nigh,<WG1448> even now<WG2235> at<WG4314> the<WG3588> descent<WG2600> of the<WG3588> mount<WG3735> of Olives,<WG1636> the<WG3588> whole<WG537> multitude<WG4128> of the<WG3588> disciples<WG3101> began<WG756> to rejoice<WG5463> and praise<WG134> God<WG2316> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> for<WG4012> all<WG3956> the mighty works<WG1411> that<WG3739> they had seen;<WG1492>

saying, <WG3004> Blessed<WG2127> be the<WG3588> King<WG935> that cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord:<WG2962> peace<WG1515> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> and<WG2532> glory<WG1391> in<WG1722> the highest.<WG5310>

And <WG2532> some<WG5100> of the<WG3588> Pharisees<WG5330> from<WG575> among the<WG3588> multitude<WG3793> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> Master,<WG1320> rebuke<WG2008> thy<WG4675> disciples.<WG3101>

And <WG2532> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> that,<WG3754> if<WG1437> these<WG3778> should hold their peace,<WG4623> the<WG3588> stones<WG3037> would immediately cry out. <WG2896>
And <WG2532> when<WG5613> he was come near,<WG1448> he beheld<WG1492> the<WG3588> city,<WG4172> and wept<WG2799> over<WG1909> it,<WG846>

saying, <WG3004> If <WG1487> thou hadst known,<WG1097> even<WG2532> thou,<WG4771> at least <WG2532> <WG1065> in <WG1722> this<WG5026> thy<WG4675> day,<WG2250> the things<WG3588> which belong unto<WG4314> thy<WG4675> peace!<WG1515> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> they are hid<WG2928> from<WG575> thine<WG4675> eyes. <WG3788>

For <WG3754> the days<WG2250> shall come<WG2240> upon<WG1909> thee,<WG4571> that<WG2532> thine<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> shall cast a trench about <WG4016> <WG5482> thee, <WG4571> and<WG2532> compass thee round, <WG4033> <WG4571> and <WG2532> keep thee in <WG4912> <WG4571> on every side, <WG3840>

And <WG2532> shall lay thee even with the ground, <WG1474> <WG4571> and <WG2532> thy<WG4675> children<WG5043> within<WG1722> thee;<WG4671> and<WG2532> they shall not<WG3756> leave<WG863> in<WG1722> thee<WG4671> one stone upon another; <WG3037> <WG1909> <WG3037> because <WG473> <WG3739> thou knewest<WG1097> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> time<WG2540> of thy<WG4675> visitation. <WG1984>
And <WG2532> he went<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> and began<WG756> to cast out<WG1544> them that sold<WG4453> therein,<WG1722> <WG846> and<WG2532> them that bought;<WG59>

Saying <WG3004> unto them,<WG846> It is written, <WG1125> My <WG3450> house<WG3624> is<WG2076> the house<WG3624> of prayer: <WG4335> but<WG1161> ye<WG5210> have made<WG4160> it<WG846> a den<WG4693> of thieves. <WG3027>

And <WG2532> he taught<WG2258> <WG1321> daily<WG2596> <WG2250> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> temple.<WG2411> But<WG1161> the<WG3588> chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> chief<WG4413> of the<WG3588> people<WG2992> sought<WG2212> to destroy<WG622> him,<WG846>
And <WG2532> could not<WG3756> find<WG2147> what<WG5101> they might do:<WG4160> for<WG1063> all<WG537> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> were very attentive<WG1582> to hear<WG191> him.<WG846>
